channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What’s for breakfast?

item.title: How AI, Tech, And Policy Can Stop The Wildfire Crisis
item.description: Wildfires are growing deadlier, but AI, satellites, and tech innovations are revolutionizing early detection, suppression, and prevention.

item.title: The Pitfalls Of Hiring A New CxO To Drive Organizational Transformation
item.description: Hiring a new CxO to drive transformation may seem like a necessary move, but it often results in failure.
